body:
@mrry I updated the PR. Now unsuccessful `Load()` will generate a warning, and the following operations will be skipped. This is similar to:
https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-cpp/blob/970a729a7d3541b2fd7948f413992e8a851ec329/aws-cpp-sdk-core/source/config/AWSProfileConfigLoader.cpp
